attributes.action: stop allowing disabled drivers to park on double yellow lines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These lines are put on the road for a reason; they are areas where it is dangerous or at least impractical for cars to be parked.   Disabled drivers, like anyone else,  should not be allowed to park on these lines.  They have many special spaces etc already where they can do so.
